DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that mathematical algorithm can identify freezing episodes based on data obtained from accelerometer.
DOC.brief_title: Automatic Recognition of Freezing of Gait Episodes
DOC.detailed_description: The subjects will walk with an accelerometer. The acceleration traces will be online analyzed, and if freezing episode is recognized, an auditory cue will be heard.
DOC.criteria: Patients with Parkinsons disease prone to freezing of gait Patients who are not able to ambulate independently
